issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: appcd
components.description: Bootstrap, appcd CLI commands (start, stop, restart, exec, logcat, config, status)

fields.description:
When the daemon is first run, we need to prompt the user to opt-in/out of telemetry. Right now, it's implicitly enabled, but can be disabled by running {{appcd config telemetry.enabled false}}.

This opt-in code block would go in appcd's [cli.js|https://github.com/appcelerator/appc-daemon/blob/master/packages/appcd/src/cli.js].
fields.summary: Add opt-in for telemetry on first run
